summary: These Argonian like creatures make great thieves. They can shroud themselves in darkness and breath under water. They are very weak to fire.
descriptionHtml:
[center][color=peru][size=48][Short Description][/color][/size]
This is a race that I made for theives. They are called the Shadome and they are closely related to the Argonians.

[size=48][color=pink][Remember To Endorse!!] [/color][/size]
[color=deeppink][Please notify me about any errors. Please feedback and endorse if you like the mod.][/color]


[size=48][color=palegreen][Back Story][/size][/color]
The Shadome (Pronounced like Shadow, but Sha-dome) come from Black Marsh and they are closely related to Argonians. They make great thieves. Shadome are NOT burglars, they are thieves. They steal, not kill and loot. They can breath under water. Shadome hate light, and they hate heat. They have a high weakness to fire. When sneaking, Shadome can cloak themselves in darkness, making them harder to spot.

[size=48][color=orangered][Overview][/size][/color]
Sneak +10
Light Armor +5
Pickpocket +5
Enchanting +5
Illusion +5
Speech +5

Ability: Waterbreathing- Can breath under water forever

Ability: Shadow Scales- When sneaking you are cloaked in darkness, making you harder to spot.
(20% fortify sneak)

Disease/Ability: 50% weaker to fire.

[size=48][color=chocolate][Compatibility][/size][/color]
Should be compatible with everything. No files are required.

[size=48][color=khaki][Bugs!][/size][/color]
None found so far.


[size=48][color=slateblue][About This Mod][/size][/color]
This is my third mod ever made. I am very proud of my work and I love to here feedback. This is a race mod that basically makes a new playable race that is a lot like an Argonian.

[color=forestgreen][size=48][Change-log] [/color][/size]
Version 1- Initial release

[size=48][color=darkorange] [Credits][/color][/size]
Skyre
Bethesda

[/center]
author: uriah12g
